summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Equipamento fields (documentation URLs, maintenance status). All features working correctly. Backend API accepts and returns all new fields. Frontend form shows new sections (Documentação, Estado de Manutenção). Switch behavior works correctly - Descrição da Avaria field appears when switch is activated. Table shows 'Avariado' badge for equipamentos em manutenção. Detail page shows documentation links and maintenance section.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/equipamentos accepts new fields (manual_url, certificado_url, ficha_manutencao_url, em_manutencao, descricao_avaria)
Backend: PUT /api/equipamentos/{id} updates new fields correctly
Backend: GET /api/equipamentos/{id} returns all new fields
Backend: GET /api/equipamentos list includes new fields
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Form shows 'Documentação' section with 3 URL fields
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Form shows 'Estado de Manutenção' section with switch
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: 'Descrição da Avaria' field appears when switch is activated
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: 'Descrição da Avaria' field hidden when switch is off
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Table shows 'Avariado' badge for equipamentos em manutenção
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Search works by código
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Search works by descrição
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Search works by marca
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Search works by modelo
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: Shows 'Em Manutenção / Avariado' section with description
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: Shows 'Documentação' section with clickable links
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: Shows 'Em Manutenção' badge in header
seed_data_creation: Created test equipamentos with new fields during testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: New Equipamento fields fully tested. The model now includes: manual_url, certificado_url, ficha_manutencao_url (documentation URLs), em_manutencao (boolean), descricao_avaria (string). Form has two new sections: 'Documentação' and 'Estado de Manutenção'. The switch controls visibility of the avaria description field. Table shows 'Avariado' badge. Detail page shows documentation links and maintenance info.

new_fields_tested.manual_url: URL field for user manual PDF
new_fields_tested.certificado_url: URL field for conformity certificate PDF
new_fields_tested.ficha_manutencao_url: URL field for maintenance sheet PDF
new_fields_tested.descricao_avaria: Text field for describing the issue (only visible when em_manutencao is true)
